conditions.displayName: High p95 latency for a URL path

conditionThreshold.filter: resource.type = "https_lb_rule" AND (resource.labels.backend_name = monitoring.regex.full_match("k8s1-fe6e51a5-default-hello-world-1-60000-38a13631") AND resource.labels.backend_type = "NETWORK_ENDPOINT_GROUP" AND resource.labels.project_id = "cco-test-lab") AND metric.type = "loadbalancing.googleapis.com/https/total_latencies"
